description.value:
Activation: 2

You swiftly strike at your target’s throat, knees, or another vulnerable area. Before the target can cry out, they are silenced.

Make an unarmed attack using Insight against the Cognitive defense of a character who is Surprised, does not sense you, or doesn't view you as a threat (such as if you are disguised). The target must be your size or smaller. Raise the stakes on this attack test. On a hit, the target also can’t communicate until the end of their next turn. Also on a hit, you can spend an Opportunity to @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.actions.Item.EVPgpHL6Y4jrumwI]{Grapple} them as 0, automatically succeeding on your test; while Restrained by this grapple, they are also Prone.
